document.full_text: los angeles lakers forward ron artest has been suspended for friday's playoff game against dallas for striking mavericks guard jose juan barea in the face, the nba said thursday.
document.title: lakers' artest banned one game for striking opponent
lines_and_colors: los angeles lakers forward ron artest has been suspended for friday's playoff game against dallas for striking mavericks guard jose juan barea in the face, the nba said thursday.
